titles.title: Endangered Species Litigation Reasonableness Act
A bill to amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to conform citizen suits under that Act with other existing law, and for other purposes.
Endangered Species Litigation Reasonableness Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: Endangered Species Litigation Reasonableness Act - Amends the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to replace the current standard for awarding court costs, including attorney fees, in citizen suits with the federal judicial code standard for awarding costs to a prevailing party.
